content:
During the last day, the Russian Federation has inflicted 328 beats in 6 cities and villages of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The Russian servicemen hit 7 air shells on Malinovka, Guliaypole and a small toct.

The occupiers also made 21 RSZV-weapons Malinovka, small Tokmachka and robot, and attacked 59 drones of Gulyaypole, Novodanilovka, Levadne, robot, small Tokmachka and Malynivka.

In addition, 241 artillery blow came across the territory of Guliaypol, Robovy, Malynivka, Little Tokmachka, Novodanylivka and Levadny.

There were 11 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, tonight Russian troopsattackedThe city of Sumy Sumy -type drones is a hit.
title: In the Zaporozhye region, the occupiers made 328 beats per day
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informed about it. RF soldiers hit 7 ...
author: Army Inform
